title: Winderer
author: Winderer
content: Check our awesome website: devvoted.ioTelegram: @devvtdServices we offer dApps development CEX and DEX platforms development NFT development DeFi development Smart contract development and audit ICO, IEO and IDO development We have experience in 10+ blockchain networks. We can build DEX/CEX/bridge on avax, arbitrum. Bsc etc. You choose.“There are so many developers on the Internet. Why go to you?"1) We help you choose the optimal technology stack.2) We do not require a giant advance payment.3) Real experience in a bunch of networks.4) Experience in launches and marketing. We can help with naming, landing texts, banner ads, etc. We can take on a huge chunk of marketing tasks ourselves.Devvoted helps customers choose the right development platform based on their business needs, budget expectations, security requirements, public or private network, and availability of both technical and physical resources. Telegram: @devvtd

comments.author: Winderer
comments.body: The team is partly available for the new tasks

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Winderer on September 05, 2023, 08:09:55 AMavailableIf you are available for such a task and you have such experience then why you work as a post bumper? Don't you know bumping thread is not a legitimate service? Anyway, lets come to the point you have mentioned a good number of skill but you have not provided reference of your skill and experience.

comments.author: Winderer
comments.body: We provide references etc in personal conversation

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Quote from: Winderer on September 20, 2023, 07:47:00 PMWe provide references etc in personal conversationProviding reference in personal conversation would not do a better marketing for you. Do other potential clients see chats you run private? How do you want to scale through successfully when your thread is scanty, nobody to attest of your services. Nothing to see to convince someone to hire you for a token. OP you should  know marketing has a key point to attract customers bit here I see nothing on your thread to attract members to you. Scanty and empty thread. Is it what you want is to see?
